package.name: 3DBadgeClear清角标-Rootless
package.shortDescription: Clear your badges from the Force Touch / 3D Touch Menu! Only appears on apps that have badges.一款快速清理角标的插件，安装之后注销生效，长按APP图标选择清理！

descriptionlist.description: Clear your badges from the Force Touch / 3D Touch Menu! Only appears on apps that have badges.一款快速清理角标的插件，安装之后注销生效，长按APP图标选择清理！
